The Website of Titiksha - SMVDU, organized in February, 2015.
Titiksha is the Annual Technical festival of Shri Mata Vaishno Devi University (SMVDU) , is one of the most popular college fest in the J&k.
titiksha.smvdu.net.in

Languages/Script :
HTML, Javascript, CSS, PHP , Ajax, XML
FrameWork :
BootStrap, jQuery
Github Link :
github.com/smvdu/Titiksha-website
